sentences.sentence: Nothing can bereave us of such sweet memories.
sentences.translation: 没有什么东西可以夺去我们这样甜蜜的记忆。

sentences.sentence: Even if they rear children, I will bereave them of every one.
sentences.translation: 纵然养大儿女、我却必使他们丧子、甚至不留一个。

sentences.sentence: The most important thing is the life in the world, whatever who, has no rights to bereave other's life.
sentences.translation: 世界上最宝贵的是生命，无论是谁，都没有剥夺别人生命的权力。
